title: Leaverbuster makes my computer freeze
body: My computer tends to freeze once in a while, and it froze during a ranked game. Well I got reported and got a Leaverbuster as I should of, and I got a 20 minute timer before I can find a game. But when the timer gets down to about 17 minutes it makes my computer freeze and shut itself off. I can play and do anything else I normally do on my computer. For some reason when i'm in the countdown it makes my cpu extremely hot. I'm assuming overheating is the problem, but I have a larger cpu fan than I need, and I have no idea why the que in league is making my cpu overheat itself. I can't play the game or do anything because of this. Any suggestions on what I can do short of buying another cpu?

replies.body:
It's unlikely that sitting idly in the queue for a match is stressing your PC to the point of a shutdown due to overheating. Since you've identified this issue is related to heat, I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to assist you in running some benchmark tests to see if the temperatures you're hitting are beyond the safety range for your hardware. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
